title: PlayStation Charges Epic for Crossplay - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.04.21
description:
Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:35 - Housekeeping
PSILY is live! Steve Saylor joins us to talk about Returnal!
The next 2 Tuesdays at 11AM PT right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames we are partnering with Razer to show off the RTX 30-series powered Blade laptops with Andy and the boys playing some Warzone
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report  -
00:06:30 - Sony Sucked About Cross-Play, Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:19:30 - EGS ain’t making money any time soon, Otto Kratky @ GameSpot
00:52:10 - RANDOM EPIC TIDBITS!!
00:38:25 - Sony TM's Sunset Overdrive, Jordan Oloman
00:44:15 - No Layoffs at Toys For Bob, Andy Robinbson @ VGC
00:46:00 - Ad
00:47:45 - Out today
00:53:06 - Squad Up:Greg Gerdes(PS5) - GregoryGerdes
00:54:07 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Janet Garcia and Ben Hansen
